html: Fact: A lethal fentanyl dose = 2-3 mg Fact: In FY17 @ICEgov seized 2,370 lbs of fentanyl, enough to kill every American Fact: Police seized 4.5 lbs of fentanyl in Columbus in Oct '17, enough to wipe out the whole city Myth: Addt'l #BorderSecurity will not help address this crisis
text:
Fact: A lethal fentanyl dose = 2-3 mg
Fact: In FY17 @ICEgov seized 2,370 lbs of fentanyl, enough to kill every American
Fact: Police seized 4.5 lbs of fentanyl in Columbus in Oct '17, enough to wipe out the whole city
Myth: Addt'l #BorderSecurity will not help address this crisis

html: Medina Police have given the all clear at Medina Hospital and Medical Office Building. They are no longer on lockdown. All patients, visitors and employees are safe. We thank all first responders for their quick actions, as well as our employees for their immediate response.
text:
Medina Police have given the all clear at Medina Hospital and Medical Office Building. They are no longer on lockdown.

All patients, visitors and employees are safe. 

We thank all first responders for their quick actions, as well as our employees for their immediate response.

html: Police are on scene at Medina Hospital responding to a potential active shooter situation in the medical office building. Both the hospital and office building are on lockdown. We advise no one travel to the Medina campus. We will continue to share updates.

html: The Great Lakes remain a priority for me. They hold about 20% of the world’s fresh surface water supply, generate more than 1.5 million jobs & $60 billion in wages annually. I will continue to champion full funding to preserve the Great Lakes in Congress.
text: The Great Lakes remain a priority for me. They hold about 20% of the world’s fresh surface water supply, generate more than 1.5 million jobs & $60 billion in wages annually. I will continue to champion full funding to preserve the Great Lakes in Congress.

html: This legislation would correct current policy and extend the presumption of exposure to our Blue Water Navy veterans who served off the shore of Vietnam. I call on my counterparts in the Senate to vote swiftly so we can give our veterans the benefits they deserve.
text: This legislation would correct current policy and extend the presumption of exposure to our Blue Water Navy veterans who served off the shore of Vietnam. I call on my counterparts in the Senate to vote swiftly so we can give our veterans the benefits they deserve.

html: I was proud to vote for the Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act. Currently, Blue Water Navy Vietnam veterans are unable to receive the presumption of exposure to #AgentOrange as current VA policy is limited to only those who served on land in Vietnam or in its waterways.
text: I was proud to vote for the Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act. Currently, Blue Water Navy Vietnam veterans are unable to receive the presumption of exposure to #AgentOrange as current VA policy is limited to only those who served on land in Vietnam or in its waterways.

html: In NE Ohio, @CVNPNPS & @GarfieldNPS are burdened with over $46.5 million in deferred maintenance. The longer we wait to address this problem, the worse & more expensive it gets. This bill addresses deferred maintenance needs & protects local economies that depend on park tourism.
text: In NE Ohio, @CVNPNPS & @GarfieldNPS are burdened with over $46.5 million in deferred maintenance. The longer we wait to address this problem, the worse & more expensive it gets. This bill addresses deferred maintenance needs & protects local economies that depend on park tourism.

html: Federal land management agencies face a deferred maintenance backlog that jeopardizes the safety and quality of our national parks and public lands. I strongly support the bipartisan Restore Our Parks and Public Lands Act to address this growing problem.pic.twitter.com/OZr5X5EVWk
text: Federal land management agencies face a deferred maintenance backlog that jeopardizes the safety and quality of our national parks and public lands. I strongly support the bipartisan Restore Our Parks and Public Lands Act to address this growing problem.pic.twitter.com/OZr5X5EVWk

html: And so, we have come together to advance legislation that will help combat the #OpioidCrisis, which has left a mark on families across America. The House passed the SUPPORT for Patients & Communities Act last week & I'm glad to see my counterparts in the Senate just did the same.

→2.6% pay raise for our troops, the largest in 9 years
→Critical support for Ukraine to resist Russian aggression
→Vital funding for research to cure diseases like cancer
→Historic funding for programs to fight the #OpioidEpidemic

html: Great news → the House passed 9 bipartisan bills that create common-sense changes for our nation’s small businesses. text: Great news → the House passed 9 bipartisan bills that create common-sense changes for our nation’s small businesses. html: Today, I supported legislation protecting patients from prescription drug costs. Americans have the right to know if a medication is cheaper when paying out-of-pocket vs. insurance co-pay. These bills allow pharmacists to advise customers on cheaper drug purchasing options.

html: Senator John McCain will lie in state in the Rotunda of the US Capitol. It’s hard to imagine a person more worthy of the honor, and I’m pleased that Americans will have the opportunity to pay their respects to this hero and statesman.
text: Senator John McCain will lie in state in the Rotunda of the US Capitol. It’s hard to imagine a person more worthy of the honor, and I’m pleased that Americans will have the opportunity to pay their respects to this hero and statesman.

html: Deeply saddened to hear about the passing of an American hero and statesman, Senator John McCain. He served our country with dedication and honor. My thoughts and prayers are with the Senator's family and friends during this time. May he Rest In Peace.
text: Deeply saddened to hear about the passing of an American hero and statesman, Senator John McCain. He served our country with dedication and honor. My thoughts and prayers are with the Senator's family and friends during this time. May he Rest In Peace.

html: The Childhood Cancer STAR Act: Advances both research and treatment for pediatric cancer Bolsters the surveillance of pediatric cancer Requires the National Cancer Advisory Board to have at least one pediatric oncology expert on its board
text:
The Childhood Cancer STAR Act:
 
Advances both research and treatment for pediatric cancer
Bolsters the surveillance of pediatric cancer
Requires the National Cancer Advisory Board to have at least one pediatric oncology expert on its board

html: Earlier this year, I joined my colleagues in Congress to pass the Childhood Cancer STAR Act. The president signed it into law in June. This measure is the most comprehensive childhood cancer legislation taken up by Congress in memory.
text: Earlier this year, I joined my colleagues in Congress to pass the Childhood Cancer STAR Act. The president signed it into law in June. This measure is the most comprehensive childhood cancer legislation taken up by Congress in memory.

html: Of many things, we appropriated more funding for veterans’ care and housing and for our Capitol Police Officers. As you can tell by the snacks on the table, my colleagues and I were prepared for a long morning, but it’s always worth it to ensure tax dollars are spent responsibly.
